About me

Hello, I’m Thao, a creative marketer
I bring energy, responsibility, and clarity into my work—shaped by experiences on both the brand side and the agency side. That mix of drive and discipline has guided every step of my career journey so far.

Client-Side Showcase: MSB

The Stories Behind the Wins

Project Lead

MSB: TikTok Channel Launch

The Challenge

The strategic challenge was to build MSB's presence on TikTok from zero. The primary business objective was to capture a new, younger audience segment and establish the bank as a modern, relevant brand on one of Vietnam's most important digital platforms.

My Approach & Solution

  • Agency & Vendor Management: I organized a competitive pitch to select and onboard the lead creative agency. I also directly sourced and managed multiple KOLs (like Phúc Thành and Việt Anh Pípo) to build credibility and reach.
  • Strategic Planning: I finalized the master content strategy and production plan with the agency, which included a slate of 40 videos designed to resonate with a Gen Z audience.
  • Execution Oversight: I managed the agency's end-to-end video production process to ensure all content was high-quality, on-brand, and delivered according to the timeline.

of Follower KPI

Social Media Strategy Lead

Driving Customer Growth with the Mega Promotion Campaign

The Challenge

The challenge was twofold: drive mass adoption of the bank's QR payment feature and reinforce MSB's long-term brand message of "sustainable development."

My Approach & Solution

  • Strategic Concept: We developed a creative concept that linked the product to the brand by positioning the "simplified lifestyle" enabled by easy QR payments as a form of modern, sustainable living.
  • Campaign Execution: As the social media lead, I collaborated with our agency to ensure this strategic message was at the heart of the campaign.
  • Product Focus: All social media activities were designed to drive users to the core promoted product: QR scan and billing on the mobile app.

Total Impressions

Project Lead, Award Submission

Securing the "Bank of the Year" Award from The Banker

The Challenge

Despite applying for consecutive years, MSB had not won this award. The challenge was to understand past failures and craft a submission that would finally meet the judges' rigorous standards.

My Approach & Solution

  • Took the initiative to contact the award organizers directly to seek feedback on previous unsuccessful submissions and gain a deeper, more nuanced understanding of their specific judging criteria.
  • Based on these new insights, I then led the end-to-end project of compiling the new submission.
  • Coordinated with multiple internal departments to gather data and achievements that specifically addressed the clarified criteria.
  • Synthesized the information into a new, compelling narrative that strategically highlighted MSB's strengths in the areas the judges valued most.

Winner

Bank of the Year 2023

Global

Prestige by The Banker

Asset

For Future Marketing

Campaign Lead

MSB 32nd Birthday: "The Dazzling 32-Year Journey"

The Challenge

The challenge was to celebrate MSB's 32nd anniversary with a major brand campaign that would increase brand awareness and foster deep engagement with both customers and employees.

My Approach & Solution

  • External Activation: The centerpiece was a large-scale roadshow combined with a bus tour through the heart of Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, offering immersive activities for passengers and creating a high-visibility brand moment.
  • Internal Engagement: To foster employee pride and participation, I managed a suite of internal activities, including an online dance cover challenge, a talent show, and an online run contest.
  • Supporting Content: The campaign was supported by a new animation video for the MSB song and a steady stream of content with digital ads on the official Facebook fanpage.

Direct Engagements

Agency-Side Showcase: Thread & Needle

Where Creative Brief Meets Proven Results

Account Executive & Project Lead

Strategic Refresh of an 'Always-On' Social Campaign

The Challenge

The strategic challenge was to bring a fresh approach to the Mộc Châu Milk "Social Always-On" project. The goal was to move beyond standard corporate content to build deeper trust with consumers and combat widespread fear of "fake milk."

My Approach & Solution

  • Insight-Driven Strategy: I identified that the opportunity was to build trust through authenticity. The solution was to move away from polished corporate content and instead show the real, transparent process of Mộc Châu Milk's production.
  • Creative Execution: I led the development and implementation of the refreshed content strategy, introducing a new, more genuine format: a "real shooting" video series. The series focused on showcasing the transparent process of Mộc Châu Milk's production and educating consumers on how to distinguish genuine products, directly addressing the market's trust issues
  • End-to-End Management: I managed the entire project lifecycle, from developing the new strategy proposal to managing the external production house, overseeing creative, coordinating with the client, and tracking performance.

+110%

Organic Reach

3x

YoY Follower Growth

Higher

Platform Engagement

Account Executive & Project Lead

Panasonic Top-Load Washing Machine Event

The Challenge

The challenge was to promote Panasonic's top-load washing machines in the Mekong Delta, a new region, and create a scalable model for expansion into other key provinces.

My Approach & Solution

  • Phase 1 - The Pilot (Mekong Delta): The initial campaign concept effectively tapped into key customer insights in the region. We created interactive experiences with live product demonstrations and attractive gifts that led to an enjoyable and memorable brand interaction.
  • Phase 2 - The Expansion (Southeastern Provinces): Based on the success of the pilot, I then managed the 5-province program expansion into the Southeastern market. The approach was hyper-localized, with customized booth visuals and tailored outreach strategies to match the new region's consumer behaviors.

4,200+

Visitors (Phase 1)

5,200+

Visitors (Phase 2)

2

Key Regions Established

Account Executive & Project Lead

Toshiba - Product Launch

The Challenge

The challenge was to successfully introduce two new Toshiba products—the Rice Cooker and Mirror Lake Series Microwave Oven—to the Vietnamese market. The launch needed to be executed quickly and effectively before the peak Tết season to maximize exposure and drive consumer interest.

My Approach & Solution

  • Strategic Channel Focus: The approach was "Facebook-first" to highlight detailed product features and benefits , while strategically using TikTok, KOL collaborations, and PR to expand reach and credibility.
  • Complex Content Roadmap: I managed a detailed 3-week communication roadmap. This involved collaborating with an external production house to shoot the Key Visuals (KVs) and coordinating a high volume of assets including iTVCs, PR articles, and content from 8 different KOLs.
  • Agile Project Management: I maintained close coordination between our agency and the client, taking swift action to find quick solutions to challenges to ensure the campaign was successfully completed on its tight timeline.

20M+

Cross-Channel Reach

8M+

Video Views

30K+

Engagements

Account Executive

PNJ: "Ngày Ta Có Nhau" Wedding Season MV

The Challenge

The challenge was to manage a high-profile music video sponsorship for PNJ's 2025 wedding season. The project required aligning three distinct, high-level creative stakeholder groups—a top musician, popular singers, and a production house—to ensure the final product was authentic, on-brand, and would generate significant media buzz.

My Approach & Solution

  • Strategic Mediation: Acted as the key liaison between the client (PNJ) and the musician (Khắc Hưng), successfully bridging the gap between the brand's message and the artist's vision to find a shared creative direction for the song.
  • Talent Scouting & Curation: Led the scouting and selection process for the lead singers. Strategically chose Lyly and Anh Tú, capitalizing on their "real couple" media buzz to create a highly relevant and newsworthy narrative for the wedding-themed song.
  • Vendor Selection: Managed the scouting and competitive pitch process to select the ideal production house (Antiantiart) for the project.
  • Project Coordination: Oversaw the high-level coordination between these three key stakeholder groups to ensure the project remained on schedule.
